pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides Easy Downloading Capabilities for the UK Parliament API // Provides functions to download data from the http://www.data.parliament.uk/ APIs. Because of the structure of the http://www.data.parliament.uk/ API, there is a named function for each type of available data for ease of use. Functions for each new API will be added as and when they become available on http://www.data.parliament.uk/.
